summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3291, for the improvement of North 36th Street from Fremont Avenue to the west margin of Evanston Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40806 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
